Question: grivix CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Grivix

Product: Autonomous Megawatt Charging System

- Fully autonomous charging system for heavy-duty electric vehicles
- Capable of charging at 6 MegaWatts (4'000A/1'500V) in just 10 minutes
- Incorporates a unique cooled cable and connector design
- Includes a communication and positioning module for optimal vehicle positioning
- Features AI-supported vision recognition for flexible design adapted to vehicle movement
- Offers rapid charging capabilities and plug-and-charge functionality
- Driven by AI and bolstered by data analytics
- Cost-effective for high-speed scale-up, requiring 40% less hardware than traditional charging stations
